name: gtek-integrated-ecosystem
description: gTek Integrated Ecosystem: Saqqara-Giza sovereign workflow with gDaTaNomOcS cybersecurity protocol, PolyStack IDE, and LiquiNomOcs economic theory. Samsung Ultra exclusive data sovereignty app with Rhodium-backed commissions. Ancient wisdom meets modern tech.
author: Jerome Elston Hill Jr.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:saqqara" "npm run dev:polystack" "npm run dev:gdatanomocs"
scripts.build: npm run build:saqqara && npm run build:polystack && npm run build:gdatanomocs
scripts.install:apps: cd apps/saqqara-workflow && npm install && cd ../polystack-ide && npm install && cd ../gdatanomocs && npm install

iron_rule_framework.pillar_1: Not for hire - Commission or charitable donation only
iron_rule_framework.pillar_2: Sovereign economic system rooted in Saqqara-Giza principles
iron_rule_framework.pillar_3: Trust as sole recipient and manager of all funds
